messages.subject: John Holt Quotes and list trivia
messages.msgSnippet: I forgot to bring the John Holt quotes! The list count has passed 2500:  Members: 2519 I m sure 1000 of them have forgotten they were on the list, or are
messages.messageBody:
I forgot to bring the John Holt quotes!

The list count has passed 2500: Members: 2519

I'm sure 1000 of them have forgotten they were on the list, or are
duplicates, or something, but that definitely leaves the "over a
thousand" I picture when I'm writing.

This new member count is also higher than usual: Activity within 7
days: 39 New Members - 204 New Messages -

I know there are some people on the list for no other reason that to
try to persuade people to go to other lists. I know who a couple of
them are, but it's not worth making a deal of it. They have lists
with no "face," no outlet, made of disgruntled and frustrated people
they pick up here and there, and take to their negative, not-so-
helpful lists. So if you're recruited on the side, from this list, it
wasn't done by someone with good intentions. And they probably don't
count half their members as active as I've always done. They think
they're doing something really great, no doubt, but they're not
hurting me, they're not hurting this list, and they're misleading
unschoolers in the dozens.

Those John Holt Quotes in handwriting.

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/AlwaysLearning/photos/album/1446626140/pic/list

I'm going to put them out where people can see them better. I don't
look in the files and photos of yahoo groups very often.

If anyone wants to contribute one to a collections, find a Holt quote
you like, write it in your own writing, scan it (or send it and I'll
scan it and put it on my site) and others can come and be inspired.

http://sandradodd.com/johnholt
(for getting quotes)

my address for mailing paper:
Sandra Dodd
2905 Tahiti Ct. NE
Albuquerque NM 87112

Or e-mail a scan, or maybe a photo (depends on the camera).

Sandra

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
